Core.Line: Have you found the key?
The key is hanging from the branch.
A chrysalis.
Metamorphosis. Yeah. Can I ask you a question?
Sure. Shoot.
I know you are having amnesia, but have you thought about yourself? Like past you, future you, BETTER you...
I hope I was a person, but I think I was not. And I probably won't even bother to be good in the future.
You won't think this way after you get your memories back. I promise.
Have you asked Card about this before?
Of course I have, dear. He said 'you are all good. Don't care what other people say. If you try to be good, you will be good.'
Encouraging. What about Card himself?
Low esteem. I do think you two can get along well.
I don't hate Card. Justâ€¦ a little distance is safer for everyone. A little.
Safe from what?
I don't know. Isn't it the scariest part?
There are risks, but opportunities as well, right?
Is that how you met Card?
He was a confused peson. A bit bad-tempered, but good-natured deep down.
I'm not judging you, but how can you believe in something that vague and seemingly everchanging?

I just accept there are consequences, good or bad, of everything. So I try to make everything better. Maybe in the meantime, I will find a better self. For the knowing nothing part, I admit it's scary. Perhaps I'm too stubborn to give up.
I hope I were as strong as you.
You are, just a bit forgetful as well. Now, here is the key. Give me some alone time, will ya? I'll meet you guys at the gate.
